text: In the new Design Manager, are Custom Modules and Hubl Modules no longer a thing? We are searching and can’t find them
html and hubl are no longer. everything is now a custom module
is it just me or did wrapping html used to wrap `row-fluid-wrapper row-depth` pieces before?

for example, the wrapping html on the module group is the `<section class="alt"><div class="section-wrap">` but in the code, it looks like it sits inside the `row-fluid`. I thought if you wrapped things it went around those, not inside.

If you want an HTML module, HS put it on the marketplace but you have to add it to the portal. They did this to try to push developers to focus on creating custom modules instead of hacked up templates filled with html modules.
